sql: SELECT count(*) FROM jobs_exported j where grid_id = 0;
explanation: Ideally, we will have no unplaced jobs in any year, although it may be acceptable to have a few in one year as long as there are none in the next, just to give the developer model a chance to respond do the demand. However, a sustained pattern is not acceptable, and probably indicates that the sampling rate for the ELC model is too low.
